questions.question: In which year did the French Revolution take place?
How many departments are there in metropolitan France?
questions.explanation: There are 95 departments in metropolitan France.

questions.question: Who painted the Mona Lisa?
questions.explanation: Leonardo da Vinci painted the Mona Lisa.

questions.question: Which river flows through Paris?
questions.explanation: The Seine River flows through Paris.

questions.question: Which scientist developed the theory of relativity?
questions.explanation: Albert Einstein developed the theory of relativity.

questions.question: What is the largest desert in the world?
questions.explanation: Antarctica is the largest desert by area.

questions.question: Which city hosted the 2012 Summer Olympics?
What is the chemical symbol for gold?
questions.explanation: The chemical symbol for gold is Au.

questions.question: Which country is known as the Land of the Rising Sun?
questions.explanation: Japan is called the Land of the Rising Sun.
